channel.title: NPC drops Error
channel.description:
Hello, i am having NPC drop problems when i go to compile i get this error:
[code]NPCHandler.java:1546: cannot find symbol symbol : method randomsoldier() location: class item2 ItemHandler.additem(Item2.randomsoldier().
NPCHandler.java:1556: cannot find symbol symbol : method randombarbarian() location: class item2 ItemHandler.additem(Item2.randombarbarian(). [/code]
Thank You For The Help

item.title: NPC drops Error
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

You havnâ€™t created a method for the randombarbarian or the randomsoldier.
You need to have them, if you have followed tutorial, then go re-do it.

Alternatively, learn how to program in java, then go and make a method for a configuration drops file.
